scripts.build:parcel: rimraf publish/module/* && parcel build dist/* --target module && cp package.json README.md publish/module/ && yarn sedit
scripts.zbuild:parcel: rimraf publish/module/* && parcel build src/index.js --target module && cp package.json README.md publish/module/ && yarn sedit
scripts.flow:info: we have to remove core.js for prototypes to run - results in having to run flow 2x on server start to run without errors
scripts.flow:init: rimraf flow-typed/stubs/flow/flowlib* && flow start && rimraf flow-typed/stubs/flow/flowlib*/core.js && flow status && rimraf flow-typed/stubs/flow/flowlib*
scripts.linkit: cd publish/module && npm link && cd - && cd publish/sandbox && npm link @downquark/proto-snips && cd - && yarn dev
scripts.postbuild: parcel build src/js/mdn-polyfills.js --target mdnpoly && rimraf dist/mdn-polyfills && mv dist/mdnpoly/mdn-polyfills.js dist/mdn-polyfills.js && rimraf mdn-polyfills.js.map && mv dist/mdnpoly/mdn-polyfills.js.map mdn-polyfills.js.map && rimraf dist/mdnpoly
scripts.test:info: by building first we remove the flow annotations that is needed by tap
